name: Sacre Bleu Frame
description: Max Bimar started with a blank sheet to come up with his new signature frame, and here it is: the Sacre Bleu features a 74.5 degree headtube, 72 degree seattube, three choices of frame size, removable brake hardware, slightly higher BB shell, midsize BB, tapered stays, angle caps, and butted Japanese seamless chromoly tubing throughout. Built to roast. SPEC L Frame Toptube: 20.7″ / Chainstay length: 13.65″ / Headtube Angle: 74.5 degrees / Seattube angle: 72 degrees / BB Height: 11.6″ / Full Japanese Seamless 4130 Chromoly Tubing / double-butted toptube and downtube / butted seattube / downtube gusset / heat-treated BB / Midsize BB / heat-treated 4mm dropouts / heat-treated integral headtube / removable U-brake lugs & cable guides / Tapered stays / 2.1kg / 4.7lb XL Frame = NB Sold Out Toptube: 21.1″ / Chainstay length: 13.65″ / Headtube Angle: 74.5 degrees / Seattube angle: 72 degrees / BB Height: 11.6″ / Full Japanese Seamless 4130 Chromoly Tubing / double-butted toptube and downtube / butted seattube / downtube gusset / heat-treated BB / Midsize BB / heat-treated 4mm dropouts / heat-treated integral headtube / removable U-brake lugs & cable guides / Tapered stays / 2.15kg / 4.8lb XXL Frame Toptube: 21.5″ / Chainstay length: 13.9″ / Headtube Angle: 74.5 degrees / Seattube angle: 72 degrees / BB Height: 11.6″ / Full Japanese Seamless 4130 Chromoly Tubing / double-butted toptube and downtube / butted seattube / downtube gusset / heat-treated BB / Midsize BB / heat-treated 4mm dropouts / heat-treated integral headtube / removable U-brake lugs & cable guides / Tapered stays / 2.17kg / 4.85lb COLOURS Chrome Plate, or Jet Black P&P IS FREE!

name: Deluxe L or XL Bars SALE!
description: We've got a few of these left so we're going to blow them out the door at a BIG discount... yup, you could get a set of 8" tall bars in chrome at this price. Check it. SPEC L Bars Width 26.5″ / Height 7.75″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.72Kg / 1.5lb XL Bars Width 27.25″ / Height 8″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.73Kg / 1.6lb P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe Superlight Seat
description:
Here, we wanted something very simple, tough, light, and also comfortable - the aluminium post permanently secures into the seat base, and the Kevlar upper is both light and durable, and so the final weight is minimal - our embossed Deluxe logo finishes it off. It's all you need...
 
SPEC
150mm Aluminium Post / Polypropylene Seat Base / Kevlar Padded Upper upper / Seat & Post weight 219grams - 7.7oz

name: F-Lite Complete Wheels - Pair
description: Our F-Lite wheels are built using our brand new Deluxe V3 F-Lite hubs, precision laced into double-wall welded wide-profile aluminium M12 rims – laced with black spokes, and ride ‘em as fast as you can. They’ll take it. SPEC Hub: CNC aluminium, 36 spoke, low-flange, sealed bearing front and rear, 9T RHD one-piece driver, 10mm female axles front and back with rear 14mm dropout-slot adapter. Rim: M12 6061-T6, 36 spoke, double-wall, welded, wide profile Spokes: Black, stainless Colours: Black, Silver, Ti Grey, Deep Red SPECIAL OFFER RRP was £229, now on sale at £179.99 a pair. P&P IS FREE

They’ll take it. SPEC Hub: CNC aluminium, 36 spoke, low-flange, sealed bearing front and rear, 9T RHD one-piece driver, 10mm female axles front and back with rear 14mm dropout-slot adapter. name: F-Lite Pedals
description: Short of ripping off a Shimano DX, what more can be done with a good design for pedals? Our new F-Lite pedals are made for us by the best pedal makers in the business, Wellgo. CNC machined from Billet T6 aluminium, they’re light, with a secure foot-feel, and built in the perfect size. SPEC Body: CNC Machined T6 aluminium, replaceable pins Internals: Chromoly axle, FAF sealed bearings Weight: 240g / 8.4oz each P&P IS FREE

name: F-Lite V2 Front Hub
description: We tested our F-Lite hubs for over a year and experienced zero problems – so they’re good to go. They feature 10mm female axles front and rear (with adapter washers for rear 14mm dropout slots), fully sealed FAF cartridge bearings, durable pawls, CNC machined hub shells and hardware, chromoly studs, one-piece chromoly 9T driver, and a super smooth no-nonsense appearance. The V2 hubs now feature cromoly axles as well… Guaranteed to go fast, we absolutely love these hubs. SPEC Body: CNC Machined, 36 spoke, low-flange Internals: Sealed FAF cartridge bearings, 10mm female chromoly studs, cromoly axle Weight: 180g Spoke Length: Typically, use 188mm for the front, with 12mm nipple Colours: Red Matching rear F-Lite hubs available... P&P IS FREE

name: F-Lite V2 Rear Hub
description: We tested our F-Lite hubs for over a year and experienced zero problems – so they’re good to go. They feature 10mm female axles front and rear (with adapter washers for rear 14mm dropout slots), fully sealed FAF cartridge bearings, durable pawls, CNC machined hub shells and hardware, chromoly studs, one-piece chromoly 9T driver, and a super smooth no-nonsense appearance. The V2 hubs now feature cromoly axles as well… Guaranteed to go fast, we absolutely love these hubs. Spec Body: CNC Machined, 36 spoke, low-flange Internals: Four sealed FAF cartridge bearings, 10mm female chromoly studs with adapters for 14mm dropout slots, hollow cromoly axle Driver: One piece 9T cog, RHD only Spoke Length: Typically, use 186mm with 12mm nipple Weight: 360g Colours: Red Matching front F-Lite hubs available... Note: We recommend 28:9 gearing. It’s just faster. P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe BMX Handlebars, Black
description: We have four sizes of bars here, with a really comfortable 12 degree sweep and a good size box, so they look bang-on. Made from 9-butted fully heat-treated 4130 chromoly tubing, the other difference here is that we reduced the diameter of the cross-brace, like BMX race handlebars: it looks fast, and it makes them lighter too. We have three colours - gloss black, clearcoat, and show chrome plate - these are Gloss Black. Made light, to go fast. SPECS L Bars Width 26.5" / Height 7.75" / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.72Kg / 1.5lb XL Bars Width 27.25" / Height 8" / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.73Kg / 1.6lb XXL Bars Width 28″ / Height 8.25″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.8Kg / 1.7lb 3XL Bars: Width 28.5″ / Height 8.5″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.8Kg / 1.75lb P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe BMX Handlebars, Clearcoat
description: We have four sizes of bars here, with a really comfortable 12 degree sweep and a good size box, so they look bang-on. Made from 9-butted fully heat-treated 4130 chromoly tubing, the other difference here is that we reduced the diameter of the cross-brace, like BMX race handlebars: it looks fast, and it makes them lighter too. We have three colours - gloss black, clearcoat, and show chrome plate. These are Clearcoat - Clearcoat is great, because the mottled colour of the full heat-treated cromoly shows through really well, and each set is unique. Made light, to go fast. SPECS L Bars Width 26.5" / Height 7.75" / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.72Kg / 1.5lb XL Bars Width 27.25" / Height 8" / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.73Kg / 1.6lb XXL Bars Width 28″ / Height 8.25″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.8Kg / 1.7lb 3XL Bars: SOLD OUT! Width 28.5″ / Height 8.5″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.8Kg / 1.75lb P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe BMX Handlebars, Chrome
description: We have four sizes of bars here, with a really comfortable 12 degree sweep and a good size box, so they look bang-on. Made from 9-butted fully heat-treated 4130 chromoly tubing, the other difference here is that we reduced the diameter of the cross-brace, like BMX race handlebars: it looks fast, and it makes them lighter too. We have three colours - gloss black, clearcoat, and show chrome plate. These are chrome - it took us a while to find a good enough chrome platers, but we've done it, and the chrome is dialled. Made light, to go fast. SPECS L Bars Width 26.5" / Height 7.75" / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.72Kg / 1.5lb XL Bars Width 27.25" / Height 8" / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.73Kg / 1.6lb XXL Bars Width 28″ / Height 8.25″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.8Kg / 1.7lb 3XL Bars: Width 28.5″ / Height 8.5″ / 9 Butted / fully heat-treated cromoly / 12 degree back sweep / 1 degree upsweep / 0.8Kg / 1.75lb P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe Bar End Extenders
description: If you want the cleanest pair of Bar Ends in the business along with making your bars just over one inch wider, then the Deluxe Bar End Extenders are here for you. These unique Bar Ends are CNC machined from 6061-T6 aluminium with a hidden grub screw that firmly fixes these to your bars... Click this link to see how they work: http://deluxebmx.com/product/bar-end-extenders/ P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe Shovelhands Grips
description: Our brand new Shovelhands grips come in a few colours - black, red, green, blue, and brown. They are longer than the average grip at 150mm long because they are Man-Sized, they come with end-plugs, and they have a unique design featuring barcode ribbing pattern and Deluxe logos. Plus, they are manufactured using ultra-soft recycled rubber. P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe Superlight Seatclamp
description: Built light, CNC machined from 6061-T6 aluminium, designed to match the Deluxe sprocket, and they come in four colours; black, polished, red, or blue. Weight < gnat's guff. Designed by Sylvain Taro. P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe Pompom Sprocket
description: The new Pompom Sprocket as designed by one of our French team riders, Mr Pompom. He's a qualified CNC machinist so he knows what he's doing, and these sprockets have come out awesome. Light, CNCd from the finest 7075-T6 aluminium, in a few sizes - colours - Black, Red, Blue, Ti Grey, or Polished. Comes drilled out for 23.8mm crank spindles (Odyssey Twombolts) and two adaptor washers, one for 22mm and one for 19mm crank spindles. P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe F-Lite Sprocket
description: With our sprocket, we wanted something simple and effective. None of us are going to be sprocket grinding concrete hubbas at every available opportunity, so we don't need anything thick or tough as a bag of old nails (or as heavy). We have the four most popular sizes, in four colours (polished, black, red, or blue), with CNC logos and a classic profile. They are CNC machined from the finest T6 aluminium. 36 tooth / 100g 30 tooth / 90g 28 tooth / 80g 25 tooth / 60g And we have them in anodised Black, Polished Silver, anodised Red, or anodised Blue. We'll post these out using 1st Class Recorded Post in the UK. P&P IS FREE

name: Deluxe Trucker Caps
description: Soft front, with mesh snap-back, and white Deluxe logo printed on the front. Quality. Simple as that.
